description: A modified version of FSL's bedpostx compatible with PBS queueing system for parallel computation.

subject_directory.title: Subject Directory
subject_directory.description: Subject directory containing necessary files such as bvals, bvecs, data, and nodif_brain_mask.

fibres.title: Number of Fibres
fibres.description: Number of fibres per voxel, default is 3

ard_weight.title: ARD Weight
ard_weight.description: ARD weight, more weight means fewer secondary fibres per voxel, default is 1

sample_every.title: Sample Every
sample_every.description: Sample every n steps, default is 25

deconv_model.title: Deconvolution Model
deconv_model.description: Deconvolution model selection. 1: with sticks, 2: with sticks with a range of diffusivities (default), 3: with zeppelins

gradient_nonlin.title: Gradient Nonlinearities
gradient_nonlin.description: Consider gradient nonlinearities, default is off
